channel.title: Forum offline time?
channel.description:
So what happened that caused the forums to go offline for almost 12 hours? DDoS?
For discussion, what did you do during that time if you even noticed it was down? Myself and a few others were just QQing on the IRC and doing random things, I was running a program to see if the forums were loading every minute :P

item.title: Forum offline time?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:400730”]It looks to me like a hard drive died from the errors that were being spit out, the odd thing is that since they are in a RAID array, it should have politely sent me an email and continued running, why it went half-down I have no idea, which isn’t good…[/quote]Is it my imagination or do the servers hard drives fail quite frequently?

Read full topic

idc about the heat I play tennis in 40 degree Celsius weather!

item.title: Forum offline time?
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

Went outside for 10 minutes came in. Played Xbox for a couple hours then its back up. Too hot outside. Its been in the 90-100’s. Right now it is… 98°F, Its been like this Non-stop for the last couple weeks. I have to wait til 8 Pm to go outside and play basketball otherwise I’m in a shower of sweat.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum offline time?

item.description:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:19, topic:400730”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497785.msg3640346#msg3640346 date=1308953101]

I will admit it was a very sad time.

Agreed

Its Friday, don’t you people have friends or jobs?
[/quote]I was joking. Ever since I finished the exams I go out with my friends and family everyday.[/quote]

Today was the first day so far this summer that I haven’t done anything with other people. Been pretty bored although I got stuff to do tomorrow

item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It looks to me like a hard drive died from the errors that were being spit out, the odd thing is that since they are in a RAID array, it should have politely sent me an email and continued running, why it went half-down I have no idea, which isn’t good…

whilst you’re at it correct your DNS (runewiki.moparisthebest.com points to minecraft shit).
